EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify that Relationship Document Exception Date is in 90 Days
EmailTemplate.name: ET45 - Relationship Document Exception in 90 Days
EmailTemplate.subject: *** Relationship Document Exception Date in 90 Days - Relationship "{!Account.Name}" ***
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Organization.Name} Team Member,
A Relationship Document Exception Date for Relationship {!Account.Name} is in 90 Days.
Document Name: {!LLC_BI__AccountDocument__c.Name} Exception Date: {!LLC_BI__AccountDocument__c.LLC_BI__exceptionDate__c}
Click here for full details: {!Account.Link}.
nCino
ET45
